alert.note: Alert for Pike (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:54PM EDT until August 07 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 754 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alpine Mountain, or 12 miles east of Mount Pocono, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bushkill, Lackawaxen, Blooming Grove, Paupack, Milford, Ledgerdale, Greeley, Pecks Pond, Dingmans Ferry and Panther. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
